Detailed Description

template<typename S, typename T>
class Serializer< S, T >

Basic interface to perform serialization on an object to any output.

Implement this class by specializing the template for the types S and T where S represents the path representation and T represents the class to be serialized. For file based serialization, S can be the filesystem path represented as a std::string or wxString

See also:
Serializer<wxString,TwitterFeed>
